description: This file sets up an agent using the Gemini model from the agno library, and runs an asynchronous response printing method for a specific prompt.

classes.name: Agent
classes.description: An agent class that interacts with language models, capable of running prompts and streaming responses.

classes.name: Gemini
classes.description: A class representing the Gemini language model from Google, used as the core model for the agent.

methods.name: agent.run
methods.description: Executes a prompt with the agent, optionally streaming the response.

methods.name: agent.aprint_response
methods.description: Asynchronously prints the response from the agent for a given prompt.
